page.title: 19Events at Water C.P.School
page.content: Whilst working on this Domesday Survey we had many events at school. The biggest was our school concert, held on two nights which had every child in the school(100 pupils)taking part either acting or singing songs from musicals. Even some of our mums and dads did a special song. We had a sports evening with races for all children, prizes for the winners, and the organisers, the Parent-Teacher Association sold pop and crisps. Many of the Junior children went in a party of 45 to the Isle of Wight for a holiday in July. It was a long coach journey for us but we visited many sights and had lots of fun on the beach, in castles and adventure parks. We also enjoyed local walks and finding out things for this Domesday Survey.
